Window replacement split over 2 years (2.2M total)
Very strong financial position (60.4% equity ratio, 2.52 liquidity)

notable_features: Law firm as property manager (not typical property management company)
Comprehensive 5-year renovation plan with specific projects and costs
Excellent financial health (60.4% equity, 2.52 liquidity ratio)
Strong renovation fund coverage (157% of 5-year plan)

new_patterns_discovered: ⚠️ LOSS YEAR: -654k kr (vs +262k profit in 2019) - MAJOR MAINTENANCE PATTERN
Cyclical maintenance: 0 kr (2019) → 781k kr (2020) - maintenance years cause losses
Renovation fund DEPLETION: 449k → 285k (-164k used for projects)
Equity ratio DETERIORATION: 21% → 13% (dropped 8 points due to loss)
Detailed loan schedule: 3 loans with specific rates (1.40%, 1.17%, 1.01%)
Actual maintenance breakdown: Målning 162k, Värmeväxlare 260k, Entredörrar 358k
